Neuro-Symbolic Action Planning

Neuro-Symbolic Action Planning

A Benchmark for Visual and Manipulation Reasoning

Neuro-Symbolic Action Planning is a modular simulation framework with accurate physics calculation, and high-quality visual rendering. NS-AP instroduces:

  • a simulation environment that uses MuJoCo physics engine with realistic Blender-based renderer,
  • a modular benchmarking pipeline that enables the use of symbolic manipulator subroutines,
  • a dataset visual and manipulation reasoning in tabletop scenario.
